attributes.additional_details: This situation must be debated now. Please sign this petition to ensure it is duly considered in Parliament.
attributes.background: Thousands of schools are having their funding cut while the Education Secretary is likely to receive a 10% pay rise (http://www.theipsa.org.uk/mp-costs/your-mp/justine-greening/). Such cuts will result in redundancies and increased class sizes. This is unacceptable especially as MPs wages increase.
